review: telltales classic dialoguebased choice system and quicktime event action sequences return while gameplay isnt mechanically deep the emotional stakes make every decision feel vital some investigation segments and minor puzzles are included but the real draw is how your actions ripple through the story culminating in two completely different final episodes depending on your path

review: an even better followup that builds on the first season with stronger writing and more intense choices the jokers origin is handled in a really creative way and you get to decide what kind of person he becomes the story is emotional dramatic and keeps you guessing until the end one of telltales best
game_title: Batman: The Enemy Within - The Telltale Series

review: telltales classic dialoguebased choice system and quicktime event action sequences return while gameplay isnt mechanically deep the emotional stakes make every decision feel vital some investigation segments and minor puzzles are included but the real draw is how your actions ripple through the story culminating in two completely different final episodes depending on your path
game_title: Batman: The Enemy Within - The Telltale Series
